name: viaduct
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a long, high bridge, usually held up by many arches, that carries a railway or a road over a valley: a railway viaduct
Malcolm MacGregor/Moment/GettyImages

Add to word list
Add to word list
a high bridge that carries a road or railroad over an area that is difficult to cross, such as a deep valley, very wet land, or the steep side of a hill: An ancient Roman viaduct crosses the valley.
